ygData.subject: Re: Third book doesn't make sence...
ygData.msgSnippet: The third book contains animated bait, firewater, collapsible fishing pole, and  Gnomish fireworks. All can be made ... From: lockjaw  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The third book contains animated bait, firewater, collapsible fishing pole,
and Gnomish fireworks. All can be made

-----Original Message-----
From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:23 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Third book doesn't make sence...


>From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
>If there was a third book, it would seem logical that it would have
>recipies for things in it other than a collapsable fishing pole. So why
>aren't we seeing more tinkered items besides this pole come out of that
>book? Unless all the other formulas in it are broken.
>
>I suspect this is a wild goose chase, and someone, somewhere is having a
>good laugh at our expense.
>
>Rotgut
>
>>
